summary: This file contains interoffice memorandums, security messages and information reports pertaining to Winfred Clark Barnes and his activities. The documents detail security checks, biographic data, clearance requests, and his employment history with Esso and International Petroleum Company. The reports also cover topics such as anti-Castro attitudes of ICP personnel, operations of refineries, and oil-related issues in Cuba.
title: BARNES, WINIFRED C.
